field.name: redirect_urls
field.label: Redirect URLs
field.description: Enable or disable redirect of Joomla Users component URLs to CB URLs.

field.name: rewrite_urls
field.label: Rewrite URLs
field.description: Enable or disable rewriting of Joomla Users component URLs to CB URLs.

field.name: return_urls
field.label: Pass Return URLs
field.description: Enable or disable passing of Joomla return URLs as CB return URLs to CBs login forms

field.name: itemids
field.label: Itemids
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of URLs for Itemid if missing.
